ISSUE.TITLE: Deleting Users
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Is it possible that your method to delete users doesn't work anymore? I don't get a server response while performing a delete request anymore (the same method works for deleting friends, though)

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge branch 'dev' * dev: Fixed unintended recursion (closes #45) fixed group creation validation

Merge branch 'dev' into activities * dev: Fixed unintended recursion (closes #45) fixed group creation validation added unit for measurement values (closes #27) fixed NPE with missing Content-Type header fixed track decoding replaced measurements with features for bulk upload Conflicts: core/src/main/java/io/car/server/core/Service.java rest/src/main/java/io/car/server/rest/encoding/MeasurementEncoder.java
